questions.question_text: "expertise" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Specialized knowledge or skill in a particular field
A personal preference for certain topics
questions.example_sentence: Each speaker was selected based on their expertise in data-driven analysis.
questions.explanation:
専門知識
好み
一時的任務
雑談

questions.question_text: "keynote" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The main speech that sets the tone for the event
questions.example_sentence: Dr. Miller will deliver the keynote address on global research trends.
questions.explanation:
基調講演
アンケート
分科会
技術マニュアル

questions.question_text: "panelist" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A member of a discussion group at an event
A person responsible for event security
A researcher who manages conference registration
questions.example_sentence: One panelist will discuss ethical considerations in AI research.
questions.explanation:
パネリスト・討論者
警備担当
質問者
登録管理者

questions.question_text: "insight" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A deep understanding of a complex issue
A printed summary of past events
questions.example_sentence: The conference aims to provide insights into emerging global challenges.
questions.explanation:
洞察・深い理解
計算ミス
要約
出席数リスト

questions.question_text: "emphasize" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To give special importance or attention to something
questions.example_sentence: Several speakers emphasized the need for responsible data usage.
questions.explanation:
強調する
無視する
短縮する
故障を特定する
